Lol the girl don't love him anymore @Erick43, a few chapters ago she said she wanted to break up with him to be with sensei, but sensei insisted on her being with childhood friend just to cuck him hard

I mean.... It's nicer than most NTR cause the cucked guy never found out, and the girl did love him, just wasn't satisfied with him anymore. It was a win-win condition for everyone. The sensei didn't steal her, but rather just used her for his sexual satisfaction. The girl didn't love sensei as her significant other, but just because of his dick. And the guy never knew of any of this, and he seems happy with his life. Also, now they have a kid, and I think that as long as cucked guy never finds out, they could live a happy life. Everyone is happy and that's all that matters, I guess? Still, pretty good art.
